summary: A team of spies is sent into Incheon to gain intelligence on North Korean positions ahead of the invasion by UN forces.
cast: Jung-jae Lee|Beom-su Lee|Liam Neeson|Se-Yeon Jin|Cheol-min Park|Jun-ho Jeong|Kim Byeong-Ok|Seon-a Kim|Yeong-ae Kim|Park Sung-Woong|Kyung Soon Jung|Yoshihiro Akiyama|Won-jong Lee|Geum-Seong Kil|Go Yoon|Sung Hyuk|Yong-wook Jin|Jang Joon-hak|Hee-jin Kim|Soo-Hang Shin|Jon Gries|Justin Rupple|Sean Dulake|Min-ji Jeong|Jae-Yeol Kim|Choong-goo Lee|Na-Kyung Lee|Jeong-won Park|Ki-bum Kim|Fan Yang|Hae-Joon Lee|Seok-jin Yoon|Joong-hee Kim|Da-Yeong Yun|Se-Jeong Kim|Won-hee Jo|Kyeong-cheol Song|Jung-ki Kim|Chang-se Lee|Jong-Wook Oh|Josie Bissett|Andrew William Brand|Mathew Darcy|Matthew Dauma|Woo Do-Hwan|Schandall Peder Ericson|Garan Fitzgerald|Damien Furtado|Karsen Henely|Daniel C Kennedy|István Medvigy|Howard Neilson-Sewell|Ron Roman|Darin Shaw|Kim Soo-Oh|Troy Zitzelsberger
title: Operación Chromite
